trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating?displayProperty=fullName> event lets you cancel changes to the current cell when the new value is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating?displayProperty=fullName>事件可让您取消对当前单元格更改，当新的值无效。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A> property to determine the current value.

To determine the state of the current cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> properties to access the cell through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定当前的单元格的状态，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>属性访问通过的单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the change, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 如果此事件已取消在数据绑定模式下，新值不是推送到基础数据源。

trans-unit.source: When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed?displayProperty=fullName> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟模式下，取消此事件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed?displayProperty=fullName>不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取需要验证的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based integer that specifies the column index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的整数，它指定需要验证的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted contents of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取需要验证的单元格格式化的内容。

trans-unit.source: The text entered by the user through the user interface (UI) becomes the FormattedValue property value.
trans-unit.target: 输入用户通过用户界面 (UI) 的文本将成为 FormattedValue 属性值。

trans-unit.source: This is the value that you can validate before it is parsed into the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 这是你可以验证的值的单元格中分析之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the formatted value.
Gets the row index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取需要验证的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based integer that specifies the row index of the cell that needs to be validated.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的整数，它指定需要验证的单元格的行索引。
